artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Artist: after Jean-Florentine Defraine; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
catalogue_raissonne:
Colas 1936
Cabinet des Modes
Le Brun
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Fashion periodical with a trifold hand-colored engraving of two belt buckles; in the center two women shown from the waist up in elaborate hats; on the right a man in light green breeches, green and white striped socks, a blue and white striped vest, a fuchsia-colored coat, a walking stick, and a black hat with a bow of white, red, and blue
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Quatrième Année, Trente-quatrième Cahier, 1 Décembre 1789
